Review Text: Coffee was okay, but after we got our order the service apparently didn‚Äôt think it was necessary to continue serving us. Not asking for further drinks or food, so that we had to go inside to ask for the bill. Could have left without paying they wouldn‚Äôt even have noticed

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: In a prime location in De Pijp, Paardje is a toastie, salad and burger place with a relatively large outside space. The food is OK but not as interesting as other restaurants nearby.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Brilliant service, kind and friendly bar staff, highly recommended.

Review Text:

Even when there are empty tables, not reserved, staff is reluctant to give away ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Nice terrace, regular selection of drinks, slightly more pricey than average. Good system to order and pay via your phone. Some of the staff is very attentive and proactive, some others you can see it's just a side job (guy who brought the drinks didn't think about cleaning the table from previous customers ü§î)

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: The food is fantastically delicious! Of course the Terrace is great for people watching. The staff is friendly and efficient. I should have taken photos... the food was beautifully presented.  üòç

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: The service is fast. The location is very nice . It is one corner. I did not try the food. Only beer and tortillas chips ....  big portion.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Great place for an outdoor lunch in the sunshine today. Food was good and the waitresses were super lovely. One of us was in a hurry and they made sure her food was really fast. A drink for our wee dog and just lovely service.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Nice, cozy restaurant in De Pijp. Full with young people. Easy to socialize, quick service, excellent kitchen. Friendly staff.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Poor service and very average food. Not a lot  of vegetarian options

Review Text: Delicious!!! Rating really to low! Everything we ordered was really good. üëç

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Amstel on tap. Great menu, poke bowl was amazing. No problem with service at all, go inside served immediately. If it's busy then most places have longer waiting times. Be pro-active in getting served. Don't sit there and then give bad reviews.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Too busy and not enough care with the rain.  They should be more prepared with more spots rainproof. We're in NL after all

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Not bad sandwiches, about 9 euros each.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: The waitress install us to the table , and then ask us to move a few minutes later , just because a Dutch Lady( regular)  can take the table and be seated With her friends , Shame on you !  The non-locals are not welcomed !

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text:
Now they charge 30euros per head upfront to have drinks outside.  Ridiculous!
----------------------
This is what i heard from your waiters at your bar not on website on the last Tuesday. So i'm telling the truth.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Horrible place. We got there at 15:35. The kitchen was closed for lunch. Had to ask for our drinks 3 times. At 16.00 we asked for snacks. Not possible till 16.15. Then we asked again. Got no reply. We asked to pay twice because we were done ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paardje

I guess, that if you are dutch, and preferably a male you  will get a good ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Visited this place this Saturday night with our group of 9, but the music got so loud we just had to leave. We're all used to busy and loud parties but this was bizarre. Staff were too busy to be approached. I hope they were wearing hearing protection! My ears are still ringing, hopefully the damage isn't permanent. Won't be coming back.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: The drinks were good, but the appetizer‚Äôs offer was a bit small. The place was beautiful and the staff very friendly!

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: This is a terrible place to go, the waiter was super rude. Not recommended at all! Despite the all bad comments about the service and staff written here, the owner still does not accept the situation and replies even rudely to your comments here. Omg!

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Lovely Place, Nice food too

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: I have been there a few time and although the food is nice the service is very bad most of the time. Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Great food and drinks!

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: One male server very good but looks like he is only serving...the lady taking orders and settling bills is very rude and needs retraining. Tons of tables and only 2 staff serving. The mint tea is very Good!!!

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: We were there for a company lunch. There weren't any other customers in the place, which seemed rather odd.  The food was good and the service was fantastic.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Fair food but awful service! I guess they're still in business because of the terrace which is in full sun during lunch. Went there twice and in not very busy days I had to wait almost an hour to get a salad and the waitress wasn't paying any attention to clients. Not recommended.

Name: Het Paardje
Review Text: Unbelievable!!! We were rejected with 2 small kids, because we came only for drinks at 14:15 and did not want to eat!!! Applaus het Paardjeüëèüèª

Review Text: Het paardje is my favorite bar. Best bar in de pijp. Very trendy, great music, good looking people. Great service. Wonderful vibe.

Review Text: This one star is only based on the horrible and slowly service, or said in another way, the service didn't exist at all.
